fiRetools 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Calculate a vector of day lengths for a given latitude, by julian day

    daylengths.Rd

    Calculate a vector of day lengths for a given latitude, by julian day

    Usage

    daylengths(latitude, precision = 64)

    Arguments

    latitude

    Latitude of location

    precision

    Optional, precision of day integral (default value 64)

    Value

    Vector of day lengths in hours

    Examples

    daylengths(-43)
#>   [1] 15.140625 15.109375 15.109375 15.078125 15.078125 15.046875 15.046875
#>   [8] 15.015625 15.015625 14.984375 14.953125 14.921875 14.921875 14.890625
